text: Hi, when I filter a hubdb table to get by endpoint <https://api.hubapi.com/hubdb/api/v2/tables/xxx/rows> then I need to get records that has a category *or* another category from a column. But the filter just uses “and” operator. Is there a way to filter the request by adding “and” operator?
you can use in operator in filters. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/hubdb/v2/get_table_rows>
